Text: Why is no one commenting on this one?! Come on guys this is firefly it deserves comments!!! Thanks for downloading this I've been wanting to learn more about River. Shes my favorite character in this entire series...

FIREFLY!!!! YAY!!!! Finally someone is showing some taste on this site, no one is commenting on this show because apparently it wasn't that popular for some reason. Come on guys this show has one of the coolest characters out here!!! Thanks a bunch for uploading this I'm really going to enjoy watching this from begining to end, to bad there weren't more seasons. Someone had the DVD Iso Image for "Serenity" posted, but no seeders!

I finally sat down and watched this last weekend, I had the full DVD set I bought from a hock shop for like 4 bucks, 4 DVD set perfect condition.

I found "Serenity" in HD and they pulled out all the stops for Serenity... No Network to muck it up.

Le610n... True what you say, but Fox-ucks who ran the series did not air the pilot episode as a Pilot, ergo dumping the viewers into the middle with no continuity. There are 3 whole eps they never showed.

This is the same crap they pulled on Chris Carter's "Harsh Realm" show, which only got the pilot ever aired.

Fox is like that, which makes me amazed that they have not dumped Fringe and Dollhouse as unceremoniously as they did Firefly.
seeeeeeed please...my sister just told me about this series and would love to get it. Thank you for your work in putting it here for us!

I only have 25% of the torrent and I've seeded more than I've downloaded.  This means one thing.  You guys need to learn how to port forward. Its easy.

Now I always seed to a ratio of 3:1 unless it takes a week to get there and my app is set to do that automatically.  But I would prefer to seed after I've downloaded.

Just learn to port forward and it will make things run a lot smoother.  It is also a good skill to learn for security.

Only issue is that the episodes are numbered wrong, here's a list of the correct order
